mapper.select: select id, roadSectionId, latitude, longitude, createUserId, createUserName, DATE_FORMAT(createDate,"%Y-%m-%d %T") createDate, DATE_FORMAT(gatherTime,"%Y-%m-%d %T") gatherTime from road_gps where roadSectionId=#{p.id} order by gatherTime

SELECT DISTINCT rm.`name` AS manName, r.`name` AS roadName, rs.`name` AS sectionName, rs.startName, rs.endName, t.roadSectionId, t.latitude, t.longitude FROM `road_gps` t LEFT JOIN road_section rs ON t.roadSectionId = rs.id LEFT JOIN road_man rm ON rs.roadMan = rm.id LEFT JOIN road r ON rs.roadId = r.id WHERE t.latitude >= #{minLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.latitude <= #{maxLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.longitude >= #{minLng,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.longitude <= #{maxLng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
